note:
Queer writer, he/him, Ph.D. candidate in creative writing at the University of Technology, Sydney (memoir, narrative non-fiction and spec bio, all through a progressive rainbow lens) and cultural commentator. Bring on the Munozian utopia. Sometimes prophesises in tongues.

Profile pic: Portrait of Lady Emma Hamilton as Cassandra by George Romney.

Background: details of tilework in the Alhambra.

Living and working on unceded Gundungurra and Gadigal lands.
